EmailTemplate.name: Repair Inquiry
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Action Required: Your Repair Inquiry
Dear Customer,
Honeywell no longer monitors this email address. Real-time information to answer your inquiry can be found in our online Order Status Tool:
Not an existing user of Honeywell's online tools?
• Register for MyAerospace here. • View our Order Status tutorial here.
If this is an AOG request, please reference this page for our latest contact information: Aircraft on Ground.
Thank you,
Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support Team
{!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
